T02TD3686E:317a-1: a'arya t'a ra de w'i bha ba na bi dhista ra /
T02TD3686E:317a-3: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa /
T02TD3686E:317a-4: lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3686E:317a-5: don med bdag la gnod pa srid pa'i bya ba rnams spangs te //
T02TD3686E:317a-6: rang bzhin brtan pas rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs song nas ni //
T02TD3686E:317a-7: gnas der bdag gi bsam gtan khang pa shin tu yid 'thad pa //
T02TD3686E:317a-8: shar du sgo btod yang na nub tu bkra shis sgo ldan pa //
T02TD3686E:317a-9: legs brtsigs de yang dum bu bzhi pas mdzes par byas pa ste //
T02TD3686E:317a-10: shin tu mnyam zhing logs dang steng 'og thams cad legs byugs shing //
T02TD3686E:317a-11: rab 'jam gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur 'tsher ba'i rdzas rnams byugs //
T02TD3686E:317a-12: rdo rjes dri zhim ldan pa'i tshon rnams ljang gus khyab par byugs //
T02TD3686E:317a-13: 'di ni steng logs sa gzhi'i byi dor rgyud rnams las bsngags pa'o //
T02TD3686E:317b-0: 'og gi phyogs ni rab tu 'thas @317b par brdungs pa kho na la //
T02TD3686E:317b-1: sa la ma lhung pa yi lci ba dri bzangs rnams dang ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-2: bsres pa yang yang byugs pas gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:317b-3: de la dri zhim me tog rnams kyis kun du gtor nas ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-4: ji ltar 'byor pa'i bla re la sogs rgyan rnams bri bar bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-5: de 'dra'i dbus sam shar gyi rtsig ngos cha la srad bu yis //
T02TD3686E:317b-6: bris sku yid 'ong mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ba sbyar bar bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-7: de mdun me tog la sogs mchod pa 'byor tshad dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3686E:317b-8: de bzhin de dbus stan bzang rab tu 'jam zhing bde ba ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-9: bris sku la bltas legs par bting pas yid dang mthun par bzhag / de yi sgo glegs rab tu sbyar bas rlung dang srog chags ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-10: shin tu phra ba'ang 'jug par mi nus 'di 'drar rab 'grig bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-11: de la logs kyi skar khung sgo dang bcas pa btod pa ste //
T02TD3686E:317b-12: che ba min zhing steng nas gdod dang dma' ba rab tu smad //
T02TD3686E:317b-13: 'di ni bsam gtan khang pa mchod rten lta bur 'gro rnams kyis //
T02TD3686E:317b-14: mchod par bya ba lha mo'i bzhugs gnas lha tshogs 'du ba'i sa'o //
T02TD3686E:317b-15: de bzhin de la sgo bltas pa yi khang pa gnyis pa ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-16: srid du khru rnams bcu bdun zheng du de'i phyed yod pa zhig / sngags pa'i 'chag sa sngon du kho nar brtag cing byi dor snga ma bzhin //
T02TD3686E:317b-17: der ni 'ju sa'i thag gu chang par gzung ba 'tsham pa la //
T02TD3686E:317b-18: reg na bde ba'i spu gu rnams dang ldan par gdags par bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-19: 'og tu 'byor pas stan nam rtsa rnams snyoms par dgram par bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-20: 'di ni khang pa dum bu gnyis pa 'chag sa bkra shis pa'o //
T02TD3686E:317b-21: de gnyis dbus su sgo btod khang pa phyogs snyoms yid 'ong ba //
T02TD3686E:317b-22: snga ma lta bur byi dor byas shing don dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD3686E:317b-23: khrus kyi khang pa sgo dang bcas pa dum bu gsum pa'o //
T02TD3686E:317b-24: der yang de la sgo bltas pa yi khang pa dum bu ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-25: bzhi pa brtsigs te der yang bkra shis sgo mchog gdod par bya //
T02TD3686E:317b-26: khang pa der ni bdag gi yo byad rnams dang mtshon cha'i tshogs //
T02TD3686E:317b-27: mi zad pa dang sngags g-yog blo gros ldan pa mkhas pas gzhag / zas kyi bya ba rnams ni khang pa der yang ni //
T02TD3686E:317b-28: byi dor ldan par brtag cing rtag tu nyi zla ldan par bcang //
T02TD3686E:318a-1: ltar dum bu bzhi pa'i khang pa kun nas gru bzhi par //
T02TD3686E:318a-2: bsgrubs nas rim pa mang por brtsegs pas shin tu mtho ba la //
T02TD3686E:318a-3: rdo leb lhag par snang ba yis dang phyir mtho sogs kyis //
T02TD3686E:318a-4: rgyal po chom rkun la sogs 'tshe ba phyir phyogs 'gyur bar bya //
T02TD3686E:318a-5: skye bo rnams dang brten pas sdug bsngal kho na 'byung 'gyur gyi //
T02TD3686E:318a-6: bde ba 'byung bar thub bas ma gsungs de phyir mkhas mchog gis //
T02TD3686E:318a-7: sngags g-yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gnyis las ma gtogs pa //
T02TD3686E:318a-8: skye bo 'ga' yang 'jug dang phrad dang sbyin pa 'du 'dzi spangs //
T02TD3686E:318a-9: snying rjes mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams legs par bshams shing gzhag par bya //
T02TD3686E:318a-10: de bzhin sgo ni shin tu gtan bcad rgya dang bcas par gzhag /'di ni gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:318a-12: // / gnas der sngags pas mchod pa'i don phyir me tog dag dang ni //
T02TD3686E:318a-13: spos dang til mar dri zhim rnams dang de bzhin rol mo yi //
T02TD3686E:318a-14: nyer spyod rnams dang 'brang phreng yid du 'ong ba'i rnga yab dang //
T02TD3686E:318a-15: me long sen mo'i bzo dang spu gri tha mal dri dang ni //
T02TD3686E:318a-16: mchod dang gtor ma'i don du sha dang nya sha dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02TD3686E:318a-17: bza' ba rnams dang sman rnams thams cad legs par gzhag par bya //
T02TD3686E:318a-18: mdor na gnas der gzhan gyi ngor blta mi 'gyur longs spyod rnams //
T02TD3686E:318a-19: mthun par gzhag bya 'on kyang chang gi sbyor ba ring du spang //
T02TD3686E:318a-20: 'byung po'i gdon dang sngags grub 'dod pas gzhan nas blang bar bya //
T02TD3686E:318a-21: dngos grub don du bkug pa ma yin bud med rnams dang ni //
T02TD3686E:318a-22: dkyil 'khor ma mthong mi rnams mthu yis rgyang grangs nyid nas bzlog / sngags g-yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor che mchog tu //
T02TD3686E:318a-23: dbang bskur thob cing snying rje che dang ldan pa brtson 'grus can //
T02TD3686E:318a-24: shes rab dang ldan dpa' zhing 'jigs bral khro med nga rgyal bral //
T02TD3686E:318a-25: blo brtan dad par gnas shing bdag la dga' 'dzin gus par bcas //
T02TD3686E:318a-26: bsgom dang dge la brtson pa 'di 'dra gnyis ni rtag par gzhag /'di ni rdzas dang g-yog gi rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:318b-0: // / blo ldan gyis ni sngar bshad stan la rdo rje skyil krung @318b gis //
T02TD3686E:318b-1: legs par gnas te bdag la myur du bskul ba'i bsam pa bskyed //
T02TD3686E:318b-2: bdag ni shin tu ring nas rang gis rnam par bslus pa ste //
T02TD3686E:318b-3: sngon chad don med spangs nas ting 'dzin bsgrubs na 'di 'dra ba'i //
T02TD3686E:318b-4: srid mtshor 'khyams par mi 'gyur bde mtha' gcig pu nyid gang yin //
T02TD3686E:318b-5: 'gro ba'i skyabs su bdag 'gyur 'di la 'khrul pa yod ma yin //
T02TD3686E:318b-6: da ni bdag gis rang la bslus pa spangs te brtson pa yis //
T02TD3686E:318b-7: dam pa'i gnas 'dir nges par lha mo'i mchog gyur sgrol ma gang //
T02TD3686E:318b-8: phongs pa la byams ma 'dra de nyid nges par mthong bar bya //
T02TD3686E:318b-9: bdag ni bstod pas dga' bar mi bya smod pa gzhan mang gnas //
T02TD3686E:318b-10: smad pas mi dga' mi byar bstod pa'ang gzhan mang gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD3686E:318b-11: de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ma lus bdag gis mnan par bya //
T02TD3686E:318b-12: lus kyis ji ltar bzod pas skad cig tsam yang dman pa yi //
T02TD3686E:318b-13: bya ba rnams la gnas par mi bya ji srid bdag gis ni //
T02TD3686E:318b-14: lha mo mthong gyur de srid mnyam dang bsam dang 'dus par 'gro //
T02TD3686E:318b-15: de bzhin tshong dang dmag dang las kyi mtha' rnams spang bar bya //
T02TD3686E:318b-16: yang dag gdams ngag bdag gis lha mo mchog las blang bar bya //
T02TD3686E:318b-17: gzhan gyis nyer bstan mun pa'i 'dab 'dras bdag la ci zhig dgos //
T02TD3686E:318b-18: ji srid lha mo mthong bar ma gyur de srid gnas 'di nas //
T02TD3686E:318b-19: 'gro bar mi bya de phyir 'di la lha rnams mkhyen par mdzod //
T02TD3686E:318b-20: de nas sngags g-yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo can gnyis //
T02TD3686E:318b-21: sngags pas bos te 'di 'dra'i bsgo ba gsal bar brjod par bya //
T02TD3686E:318b-22: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs su ma rdzogs par du gnas 'di las //
T02TD3686E:318b-23: 'gro bar mi bya lha rnams dbang btsugs khyod kyis 'di shes byos //
T02TD3686E:318b-24: de srid bdag gi yid dang mthun pa'i bya ba khyed kyis byos //
T02TD3686E:318b-25: dngos grub cha las khyed la 'ged 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02TD3686E:318b-26: de nyid kyis ni thal mo sbyar bas legs par smras pa gzung //
T02TD3686E:318b-27: lha rnams dpang du gnas pas bdag cag khyod kyis 'dod bzhin bgyid //
T02TD3686E:318b-28: dngos grub cha la bdag cag dran par mdzod la spang mi bya //
T02TD3686E:319a-0: de skad brjod de ji ltar 'dod @319a * //
T02TD3686E:319a-1: pas rang gi bya ba brtsam //
T02TD3686E:319a-2: 'di ni sgrub pa po dang g-yog dang grogs dang dam bca' ba'i rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:319a-4: // / de nas sngags pas stan bde nyid la 'dug bzhin rab rgyas pa'i //
T02TD3686E:319a-5: gtor ma mdun du bzhag ste de bzhin mchod pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02TD3686E:319a-6: de nas rang snying pam bskyed padma'i dbus su zla 'dra ba'i //
T02TD3686E:319a-7: yi ge aom las byung ba'i zla ba rnam bsam de steng du //
T02TD3686E:319a-8: gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan //
T02TD3686E:319a-9: zla ba'i dum bu'i steng na nam mkhas mnan cing mdog ljang gu //
T02TD3686E:319a-10: stong phrag du ma'i snang ba ldan bsam de las byung ba'i 'od //
T02TD3686E:319a-11: mtshon cha'i dbyibs can 'phros pas bla ma dang ni rgyal sras bcas //
T02TD3686E:319a-12: sgrol ma bkug ste mdun bzhugs de dag mchod pa gnyis kyis mchod //
T02TD3686E:319a-13: yan lag bdun ldan bya ba bsgrubs nas slar yang gshegs par bya //
T02TD3686E:319a-14: de mthar chos kun stong zhing bdag med lta bas gsang sngags ni //
T02TD3686E:319a-15: theg chen mngon par rtogs byed lan gsum par du bzla bar bya //
T02TD3686E:319a-16: slar yang mkhas pas sa bon mchog bsam de las byung ba'i 'od //
T02TD3686E:319a-17: sgrol mar gyur pas 'gro rnams dag byas slar 'dus zhugs pa yi //
T02TD3686E:319a-18: yi ge yongs gyur autpal ljang gu snying po sa bon ldan //
T02TD3686E:319a-19: skad cig nyid gyur sa bon las byung lha mo ma lus bsdus //
T02TD3686E:319a-20: rang gi gnas su thim gyur de las legs byung lha mo ni //
T02TD3686E:319a-21: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang gu spyan yangs rgyan kun 'dzin //
T02TD3686E:319a-22: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin g-yon pas yu ba dang bcas autpal 'dzin //
T02TD3686E:319a-23: bcu drug lo lon rab sgeg gzi ldan padma zla ba'i gdan //
T02TD3686E:319a-24: cung zad 'dzum bcas sgrub pa po la mngon dgyes thugs rje can //
T02TD3686E:319a-25: ma lus bud med rgyan dang cha lugs 'dzin pa 'di 'dra bsam //
T02TD3686E:319a-26: slar yang sa bon las byung ye shes lha mo spyan drangs te //
T02TD3686E:319a-27: 'chad 'gyur phyag rgya'i steng gnas zla ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD3686E:319a-28: mchod pas legs mchod man ngag ji bzhin rang la bstim par bya //
T02TD3686E:319a-29: sku gsung thugs la gnas pa'i lha rnams legs par byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD3686E:319b-0: de bzhin blo ldan bu yis gus pas dbang bskur don @319b gnyer bya //
T02TD3686E:319b-1: rtsod pa mi mnga' ba'am dam tshig rdo rje spyi bor byung //
T02TD3686E:319b-2: de ltar cho gas legs bsgrubs rang nyid padma zla ba la //
T02TD3686E:319b-3: rnam bzhugs lha mo'i thugs kar sen zlum mnyam pa'i zla ba ni //
T02TD3686E:319b-4: rjes mthun padma la gnas lha nyid mthe bong tshon dang mtshungs //
T02TD3686E:319b-5: zla steng bcu yi yi ges yongs bskor dbus na sngar bshad nyid //
T02TD3686E:319b-6: ljang gu'i 'od zer dang bcas mgo rnams gyen phyogs gsal bsams te //
T02TD3686E:319b-7: dbus ma dang ni bcu pa'i bdag nyid 'od zer dang bcas byung //
T02TD3686E:319b-8: snying ga nas song phyi rol lha mo nyid gyur 'gro rnams kyi //
T02TD3686E:319b-9: sdug bsngal zhi byas mthun gyur sgo de nyid nas slar bsdu bya //
T02TD3686E:319b-10: 'di ni spro bsdu'i ting 'dzin nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal byed pa'o //
T02TD3686E:319b-11: de 'dra ting nge 'dzin mang du byas pas sngags pa'i yid skyon //
T02TD3686E:319b-12: snying zla'i rnam 'phrul la dmigs gzhan sems rab tu spangs nas ni //
T02TD3686E:319b-13: dang por rnam par snang mdzad de rjes gsal bya'i bcu drug pa //
T02TD3686E:319b-14: 'og tu dbyangs yig gnyis pas legs bsten pa ste de rjes su //
T02TD3686E:319b-15: nyi ma'i bu la steng du ae yis mtshan cing gnas pa'o //
T02TD3686E:319b-16: de nas gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid au yis bcings pa la //
T02TD3686E:319b-17: phyed cha'i ta yis mtha' ma bsten pa'o de rjes sngar bzhin las //
T02TD3686E:319b-18: slar yang bcu drug pa ni aus bcings me bu ae dang ldan //
T02TD3686E:319b-19: slar yang aushma'i gsum pa mthar gnas pa yi gnyis par ldan //
T02TD3686E:319b-20: de nyid dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan byas rjes su aushma yi //
T02TD3686E:319b-21: bzhi pa nga ro gnyis pas spras byas 'di 'dra'i gsang sngags ni //
T02TD3686E:319b-22: shin tu gsal min de bzhan mi gsal ma yin sgra che dang //
T02TD3686E:319b-23: shin tu chung min sems gzhan rnam par g-yengs ba spangs pa yis //
T02TD3686E:319b-24: brgya rtsa brgyad las lhag pa'am de bzhin nor bur bzung ste bzlas //
T02TD3686E:319b-25: gang tshe de yi yid ni bzlas pas skyon sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD3686E:319b-26: 'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro rnams bkug ste man ngag ji lta bar //
T02TD3686E:319b-27: sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya phyag rgya ni //
T02TD3686E:319b-28: lag gnyis thal sbyar mdzub mo dag gis gung mo 'khyud byas te //
T02TD3686E:320a-0: mthe bong gnyis kyis snying por byas pa 'di yi @320a * //
T02TD3686E:320a-1: gsang sngags mchog / bzlas dang gtor ma sbyin dang bstim sogs phal cher sbyar bar bya //
T02TD3686E:320a-2: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharma n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'at aom a'a:h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD3686E:320a-3: gtor ma phul nas yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas ni //
T02TD3686E:320a-4: bzod par gsel zhing yongs bsngo mngon 'dod dngos grub gsol btab nas //
T02TD3686E:320a-5: de nyid gsum mthar mu:yis bskul bas lha rnams bzhud par bya //
T02TD3686E:320a-6: de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du rab gsal legs mchod nas //
T02TD3686E:320a-7: yi ge brgya pa rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pas legs bzlas te //
T02TD3686E:320a-8: bzod mdzod bdag blo 'khrul pas ting 'dzin mchog las nyams pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320a-9: mchod dang gtor ma dman zhing sngags dang phyag rgya 'khrugs pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320a-10: brtson pa dman zhing sems ni dam pa ma lags gang skyes pa //
T02TD3686E:320a-11: thams cad khyed kyis bzod mdzod grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD3686E:320a-12: de bzhin khyod 'drar bdag gyur 'gro rnams srid mtsho las sgrol shog / myur du khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i zhal bzang bstan du gsol //
T02TD3686E:320a-13: bdag la myur du thugs mchog rab tu brtse bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD3686E:320a-14: thugs rje'i lha mo khyod kyis bdag la myur du dbang bskur dang//
T02TD3686E:320a-15: dam pa'i gdams ngag bstan pas yang dag lam bstan rigs pa nyid //
T02TD3686E:320a-16: de rjes mchod dang bstod pa'i dam pa rab tu gus pas gdon //
T02TD3686E:320a-17: de nas rang sngags sv'a h'a'i gnas su mu:sbyar ba yis gshegs //
T02TD3686E:320a-18: bdag nyid lha mo'i nga rgyal ldan pas ci bder gnas par bya ;
T02TD3686E:320a-19: /'di 'dra thun mtshams bzhir ni rab mnyam gzhag pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD3686E:320a-20: nyin gcig bzhin du 'bad pas bsams na de yis nges par ni //
T02TD3686E:320a-21: zla drug de bzhin lo gcig nyid dang gsum gyi nang du ni //
T02TD3686E:320a-22: lha mo mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom mi bya gzhan du na //
T02TD3686E:320a-23: cho ga nyams pas bskal pa skar ma mnyam par mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:320a-24: 'di ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rnam par dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:320a-26: // / shin tu khro bar 'dod cing 'dod chags che dang lhag par ni //
T02TD3686E:320a-27: gnyid 'byung ba dang de bzhin rab tu mi dga' ngu bar 'dod //
T02TD3686E:320b-0: bsam gtan khang pa spangs @320b te gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-1: bsam gtan gnas su mi bzad sgra 'byung de bzhin sgo dag las //
T02TD3686E:320b-2: 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byung cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag thos pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-3: nang na gnas pa'i ming nas phyi phyir 'bod pa dang ni dgod //
T02TD3686E:320b-4: skyugs pa dang ni glu len sgra dang so gol rdeb cing mkhun //
T02TD3686E:320b-5: shin tu mi bzad dri mi zhim pa'i ngad ldang skye bung zhes //
T02TD3686E:320b-6: 'jigs dang gzugs mi sdug pa mthong dang brdeg dang 'phul bar byed //
T02TD3686E:320b-7: rtag tu rmi lam sdug bsngal mthong dang 'dre yis gnon pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-8: shin tu dga' zhing mkha' la 'phur snyam byed dang rgyu med dgod //
T02TD3686E:320b-9: glo bur du ni gzhan gyi sems shes 'dre smra rna bas thos //
T02TD3686E:320b-10: 'jigs par byed pa'i 'od zer khang par rab tu 'byung ba dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-11: dman pa'i man ngag ston pa'i rang lha'i gzugs ni mthong ba dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-12: mngon du steng nas shin tu gnon cing mthong bar byed pa ste //
T02TD3686E:320b-13: mdor na gang gis bzlas dang bsam gtan dag gi bar chad byed //
T02TD3686E:320b-14: de bzhin blo ni snga las nyams par byed pa de ni bgegs //
T02TD3686E:320b-15: yin phyir bla ma'i man ngag kho nas bzlog par bya ba ste //
T02TD3686E:320b-16: bla ma'i man ngag med par sgrub la brtson pa de ni 'dir //
T02TD3686E:320b-17: srog dang dngos grub gnyis ka gdon chen rnams kyis 'phrog par 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:320b-18: bla ma'i man ngag can la bgegs rnams 'byung par mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD3686E:320b-19: 'byung yang blo can de ni bzlog par bya ba tshogs dang bral //
T02TD3686E:320b-20: 'di ni bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang de rab tu bzlog pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:320b-23: // / shin tu dri zhim ngad ldang yid ni dge la mngon dga' dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-24: lus ni rab yang gnyid ni mi 'byung khams rnams snyoms pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-25: shin tu sgra snyan pa dang rol mo'i sgra rnams grag pa dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-26: me tog char 'bab til mar bral bar mar me 'bar ba dang //
T02TD3686E:320b-27: rmi lam na ni 'phags rnams mthong dang dge slong bram ze mthong //
T02TD3686E:320b-28: rtag tu dge ba'i rmi lam mthong dang chags dang khro dang bral //
T02TD3686E:320b-29: yid ni dga' bar byed pa'i 'od chen khang par 'byung ba ste //
T02TD3686E:320b-30: mdor na yid ni gang gis snga las dga' gyur bzlas pa dang //
T02TD3686E:321a-0: sgom pa dag la bar du mi gcod @321a * //
T02TD3686E:321a-2: 'dir ni bzlas dang bsgom pa ji tsam gsal ba de nyid mchog /'di ni mtshan ma bzang po'i rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:321a-4: // / sman mchog bza' ba ma legs nges par dug tu 'gyur ba ltar //
T02TD3686E:321a-5: dngos grub len mi mkhas pa rnams kyi dngos grub phyir phyogs pa'am //
T02TD3686E:321a-6: yang na srog gi bar chad dag tu'ang 'gyur bas de yi phyir //
T02TD3686E:321a-7: mkhas pas dngos grub blang ba 'khrul pa med par shes par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-8: rgya mtshor rin chen len pa rnams la 'tshe ba rnam mang 'byung //
T02TD3686E:321a-9: de bzhin dngos grub rin chen len pa rnams la 'phrog pa mang ;
T02TD3686E:321a-10: /'di ni gdon chen dngos grub 'phrog brtson rab tu mang ba ste //
T02TD3686E:321a-11: dngos grub rnams ni sgrub pa pos kyang bsrung bar rab tu dka' //
T02TD3686E:321a-12: de bas blo ldan 'jigs pa ma lus ring du spangs pa yis //
T02TD3686E:321a-13: mi bzang mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rab tu gzhig par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-14: 'jigs par mi bya khrod dang chags pa rnam par spang par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-15: mtshan bzangs rnams kyang sgyu ma 'dra bar blta bya ri rab bzhin //
T02TD3686E:321a-16: mtshan ma'i rlung gis nges par mi g-yo mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-17: de tshe de la lha mos yang dag zhal ston 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD3686E:321a-18: thun mong ma yin bde ba 'byung 'gyur gus pas mchod cing bstod //
T02TD3686E:321a-19: 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol gdab yang dag gdams ngag don du 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:321a-20: ji srid gsung ba mi mnga' 'bad pas rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-21: gang tshe gsung pa mnga' ba de tshe gzhan la ltos dang bral //
T02TD3686E:321a-22: de ni lha mo'i sras yin bsam gyis mi khyab dbang dang ldan //
T02TD3686E:321a-23: rgyal ba'i sras po sgrib pa kun dang bral ba dpal ldan yin //
T02TD3686E:321a-24: de yis dngos grub dang ni mtshan ma gnyis ka ji srid du //
T02TD3686E:321a-25: gnang bar ma gyur de srid gzhan la zur tsam smra mi bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-26: skad cig de nyid la ni dngos grub ring 'gyur dran par bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-27: grub par gyur nas sngags g-yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog la //
T02TD3686E:321a-28: dngos grub cha la ser sna bral bas sbyin bas phan gdags bya //
T02TD3686E:321a-29: pha ma dang ni bla ma la yang dngos grub rdzas dag las //
T02TD3686E:321a-30: chos mchog skal ba bgo bar rgyud rnams las ni rnam par bshad //
T02TD3686E:321a-31: mdor na dngos grub dag ni ji ltar bgo ba blo ldan gyis //
T02TD3686E:321b-0: rgyud @321b rnams nyid las ji ltar bshad pa'i rjes 'brangs shes par bya //
T02TD3686E:321b-1: 'di ni dngos grub blang ba dang bgo ba'i rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:321b-3: // / gang dag dkyil 'khor mchog tu dbang bskur ma thob skye bo dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-4: sdom dang dam tshig mi srung bla ma'i bka' las 'das pa dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-5: bla ma la ni mi gus yid kyis bla ma la ni 'phya //
T02TD3686E:321b-6: de bzhin sngon du bla ma dag la gus shing lkog na smod //
T02TD3686E:321b-7: blo ni the tshom dra bas khyab cing brtson 'grus zhan pa dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-8: blo gros mi brtan nyin gcig bzhin du lha rnams gzhan 'dzin dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-9: sdang zhing bud med bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed dang de bzhin du //
T02TD3686E:321b-10: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed ma byas gnyid la dga' ba dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-11: shin tu blun zhing chags dang sdang ba dregs ldan de bzhin du //
T02TD3686E:321b-12: sdug bsngal dag la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus sems stobs chung //
T02TD3686E:321b-13: cung zad smod tshig thos na rab tu mi dga' de bzhin du //
T02TD3686E:321b-14: cung zad bstod pas rab dga' rnyed pa la ni brkam pa dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-15: cung zad sngags kyi mthu snyems rmi lam tsam gyis dregs pa dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-16: glegs bam 'dzin cing man ngag yod ces mi rnams la smra dang //
T02TD3686E:321b-17: phrag dog dri mas sbags shing man ngag med la ser snas bcings //
T02TD3686E:321b-18: stong nyid ston pa'i chos la sdang zhing dngos por 'dzin la dam //
T02TD3686E:321b-19: nyan thos spyod pa la ni mngon zhen sngags tshul sun par byed //
T02TD3686E:321b-20: bdag gi phyogs la mngon zhen gzhan phyogs ngag la rnam par sdang //
T02TD3686E:321b-21: rta la sogs pa zhon zhing lcag gis gzhu dang glo rdebs byed //
T02TD3686E:321b-22: chang 'thung ba dang 'jig rten gtam la dga' zhing zas la brkam //
T02TD3686E:321b-23: 'dus par 'gro dang dmag dang 'thab mo'i bya ba rnams la dga' //
T02TD3686E:321b-24: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kha 'dzin phra mas 'tshe bar byed //
T02TD3686E:321b-25: rang gis dpyad pas sngags tshul zab mo rnams la sdeb sbyor byed //
T02TD3686E:321b-26: bla ma'i lung thob med par sngags rnams 'chad par kun du rtsom //
T02TD3686E:321b-27: bsnyen bkur dman zhing bla ma rnams la myur du man ngag 'dod //
T02TD3686E:321b-28: 'di 'dra'i mi yis gangg'a'i bye ma mnyam par rab bsgrubs kyang //
T02TD3686E:321b-29: dngos grub mi 'byung de dag phung po rnam par nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:321b-30: 'di ni sgrub pa po'i skyon gyi rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:322a-0: // / @322a * // gang gis sngar bshad skyon spangs de ni dngos grub snod yin te //
T02TD3686E:322a-1: de la bla mas man ngag ma lus sbyin pas phan gdags bya //
T02TD3686E:322a-2: des ni dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD3686E:322a-3: de ni blo ldan rgyal ba'i myu gu rig 'dzin rnams kyi grogs //
T02TD3686E:322a-4: 'khor bar gnas kyang padma bzhin du dri mas nyams mi 'gyur //
T02TD3686E:322a-5: 'di ni dngos grub snod kyi rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:322a-7: // / gang tshe sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni na bar gyur pa na //
T02TD3686E:322a-8: phyi nang 'chi ba'i mtshan ma dang ni legs par brtag par bya //
T02TD3686E:322a-9: 'chi ba'i mtshan ma byung gyur sgrol ma 'byung ba las gsungs pa'i //
T02TD3686E:322a-10: phyi nang slu bas 'chi bdag bsrung phyir rab tu brtson par bya //
T02TD3686E:322a-11: 'chi ba'i mtshan ma snang min de tshe sman mchog dag pa ni //
T02TD3686E:322a-12: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags nad zhi ba dang spel ba btab nas ni //
T02TD3686E:322a-13: bza' dang lus byug bya zhing lha mo sku mdog rnam dkar bas //
T02TD3686E:322a-14: bdud rtsis yongs bkang rin chen bum pas spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
T02TD3686E:322a-15: shin tu bde bas lus khyab nang rnams rab tu zhi bar bsam //
T02TD3686E:322a-16: sman pa'i dpyad rnams spang par mi bya 'on kyang sngags mchog dang //
T02TD3686E:322a-17: dbang bskur ba ni nad rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mchog /'di ni 'chi ba'i dus las slu ba dang nad gso ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:322a-19: // / de nas sbyin sreg cho gas zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni //
T02TD3686E:322a-20: gsang dang dgug par 'dod dang rtsa ba'i rgyud la gsungs pa yi //
T02TD3686E:322a-21: cho gas sbyin sreg rab tu brtsam bya 'di ni rtogs par sla //
T02TD3686E:322a-22: char bcad pa dang dbab dang de bzhin 'tshe ba thams cad ni //
T02TD3686E:322a-23: zhi bar bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa sngags pas dpyad //
T02TD3686E:322a-24: 'di ni las thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o /
T02TD3686E:322a-26: // / de ltar sgrol ma la gus rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD3686E:322a-27: bsgom pa'i cho ga rnam par rgyas bshad pas //
T02TD3686E:322a-28: 'gro rnams srid mtsho las brgal sgrol ma yi //
T02TD3686E:322a-29: go 'phang la ni myur du gnas par shog /'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3686E:322a-31: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dul ba'i lha dang /
T02TD3686E:322b-0: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong @322b chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
